name: Synthesis Med Legal Consulting
what_you_do: Synthesis Institute offers psychedelic education and training programs, including core training for practitioners and immersive retreats.
who_you_serve: They serve individuals interested in psychedelic care, including practitioners, students, and those seeking personal transformation through psychedelic experiences.
signature_programs: Psychedelic Practitioner Core Training, Practitioner Fundamentals, Colorado Facilitator Training
current_projects: Early Registration Savings for Psychedelic Practitioner Core Training in October 2025, various upcoming events and retreats in 2025.
bio: 100+ psychedelic leaders and educators, 500+ students and alumni, 1,100+ participants in legal psychedelic retreats since 2018.
business_focus: Synthesis Institute offers psychedelic education and training programs, including core training for practitioners and immersive retreats.
